ChunkText: step 1: request your OPT I-20 students must first request a special OPT I-20 from the isss office. applications submitted to uscis without an OPT I-20 will be denied. students must submit a complete OPT request in the isss portal. first, students choose an OPT start date.
ContextBefore: application submission period OPT applications must be submitted to uscis no earlier than 90 days before your program end date and no later than 60 days after your program end date. OPT applications submitted to uscis outside of this date range will be denied. work with the isss office to prepare your application early.
ContextAfter: the OPT start date can be any date within the 60 days after the I-20 program end date. please refer to the table andor graphic above to choose an OPT start date. second, students will need to upload a draft i-765. students should download a draft i-765 by clicking view draft snapshot in their online uscis account.
